name: github-monitor-cdk
description: CDK app to monitor GitHub repository commits and send git diff notifications via SNS

scripts.lint: echo '🔍 Running ESLint validation on all JS/TS files...' && eslint bin/ lib/ lambda/ --ext .js,.ts --max-warnings 0
scripts.lint:fix: echo '🔧 Running ESLint auto-fix on all JS/TS files...' && eslint bin/ lib/ lambda/ --ext .js,.ts --fix
scripts.lint:check: echo '📋 Checking ESLint compliance (zero tolerance)...' && npm run lint:fix && npm run lint
scripts.validate: echo '🚀 Starting build and CDK validation...' && npm run build && cdk synth

bin/**/*.{js,ts}: echo '🔍 Validating TypeScript files in bin/ directory...'
lib/**/*.{js,ts}: echo '🔍 Validating TypeScript files in lib/ directory...'
lambda/**/*.{js,ts}: echo '🔍 Validating JavaScript files in lambda/ directory...'
